description: This file defines a React functional component named Contact for the front-end of a portfolio website. It includes a contact form with validation, submission logic, and social links.

methods.name: Contact
methods.description: React component rendering a contact section with form and social links.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, validation, and contact request.

methods.name: IconButton
methods.description: Reusable component for social icon links.
